> **The course**

**Using R for data analysis** is an online course for bachelor/master students of Biomedical Sciences Leiden University.  
It is also offered as a general course organised by [Boerhaave Nascholing](https://www.boerhaavenascholing.nl/).  

> **Lecture materials**

The materials are adjusted depending on schedules. Please select your group:

- [B3DS, November 2022](B3DS_202211)
- [B1R, November 2022]()
- [Clinical Research in Practice (CRiP), September 2022](CRIP_202209)
- [Boerhaave Nascholing (I),  May 2022](Boerhaave_202205)
- [B3DS, November 2021](B3DS_202111)
- [Boerhaave Nascholing (II), October 2021](Boerhaave_202110)
- [Clinical Research in Practice (CRiP), September 2021](CRIP_202109)
